document.docTitle: Dyspessa elbursensis subsp. elbursensis elbursensis Daniel. D 1964

Distribution in Iran .
N, W, S, and SW Iran ( Fig. 25C ).

Remarks. Considering the new status of
D. elbursensis derbenti
as one of the previously subspecies of
D. elbursensis
(see above), the latter species becomes monotypic.
